name: Pro Fish Smart Fish (Rique Muradas)
description:
It’s Piracema time, which means reproduction time!

Swimming upstream is essential to burn fat and produce hormones responsible for fish reproduction.

The upstream journey is full of dangers. Fish must overcome the water current, predators and fishing. Most of them do not win more than 3 km... but there are records of pro and smart fishes that swimmed over 20 kilometers to finally meet their lovers.

Are you a pro and smart fish?

Prove yourself in this game!
